text: neohui gaunde jihaleu hyeongtaelo anaewa ihonhalyeoneun ja iss-euna geu nyeodeul-eun geudeul-ui eomeonideul-i doel su eobs-eumyeo nah-a jun bun oeeneun eoneu nugudo eomeonideul-i gyeolko doel su eobs nani sillo geudeul-eun hyeom-oseuleobgo geo jisdoen mal-eul hadoda geuleona hananim eun yongseohasimgwa gwan-yong-eulo chungmanhasi nila
